participant_1.name: Alexander
participant_1.personality: Confident and ambitious, with a strong drive for success. He enjoys discussing finance and luxury cars, often displaying a sense of superiority.
participant_1.background: i graduated from yale in 2011 with a degree in finance. i grew up in manhattan. i drive a bmw. my parents are very wealthy bankers.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Creative and slightly anxious, she expresses her fears openly. She values her hobbies and has a nurturing side, especially towards her pets.
participant_2.background: i'm scared of dying. i have a dogs. knitting is my passion. the county wide bake sale is where i feel most at home.
